Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Officiant', 3: "Congratulations! You've won the grand prize!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'One corner of the venue bursts into noise—some groaning over picking the wrong number, others clapping in celebration.'}
{3: 'Then, amid the cheers, a shy and slightly bewildered girl steps onto the stage. She accepts the prize from the officiant.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: '...Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{3: "She doesn't seem used to so much attention. Once the award ceremony ends, you lead her away from the noisy crowd to somewhere quieter."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Can Bambinata open it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Yeah.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She takes her time with the wrapping, careful not to tear the pretty paper. Layer by layer, she peels it away until a faint pink object comes into view.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: '"Happy Little Home"... Commandant, there\'s a tiny house inside.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The prize is a miniature house set, complete with two figurines. The packaging says it can be used to play house.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Hello, welcome home...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "...Mhm, you're back...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The moment she takes the figurines out, Bambinata starts acting out a conversation between them, clumsily adjusting their poses and lowering her voice.'}
{2: "Let's play house, Bambinata.", 3: '41', 4: 'Want to play house?', 5: '41'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Alright!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She thinks for a moment, then smiles warmly and hands you the figurine dressed in a suit.'}
{2: '(Take it)', 3: '45', 4: 'What roles are we playing?', 5: '45'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "You'll be the tired office worker coming home from work. Bambinata'll be waiting for you to come back, because Bambinata is your...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Halfway through, she stops talking and starts searching for the right word.'}
{2: "Then let's play it that way.", 3: '54'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Thanks, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "You should come in through the main door looking tired, and Bambinata'll greet you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She places her figurine in the kitchen area, probably pretending to prepare a meal. Following her lead, you use your figurine to open the door...'}
{2: "I'm home.", 3: '61', 4: 'Ah, what a long day!', 5: '65'}
{3: 'You greet her as part of the scene, playing your role in the little game.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Welcome home, my family... or welcome home, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She tries saying your real name gently.'}
{3: "You let out a theatrical sigh, the kind of mix of pain and relief you'd hear from a worn-out office worker in a story."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Did your manager scold you again today? Don't worry, I'll give you a head pat.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her figurine seems to radiate warmth as she moves it, patting the head of the "exhausted" worker collapsed at the entryway.'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "But... there's something I have to tell you.", 4: '1'}
{3: "However, after that brief moment of warmth, Bambinata's figurine stands straight, her own face turning serious."}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "The landlord came by today. He says we need to pay the rent right now... or we'll be kicked out tomorrow.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'And the rice jar is empty. Bambinata was in the kitchen just now, wondering how to make four dishes and a soup with only water and soy sauce...', 4: '1'}
{2: "So that's what you were thinking about in the kitchen...", 3: '80', 4: "It's that bad?", 5: '80'}
{2: 'Enough! Hold on a second!', 3: '82', 4: 'This is seriously weird...', 5: '82'}
{2: 'What kind of "play house" setting is this?', 3: '83'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Hmm? It's a common plot in books. Bambinata's been reading a lot of them lately on the terminal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Other Constructs told Bambinata these stories are really popular right now and that Bambinata should try reading them... Is it not right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How about we try something else?', 3: '88'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Something else... Hmm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Bambinata doesn't have any ideas. Sorry, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lowers her head, looking troubled.'}
{2: "Why don't you tell me something that's happened lately?", 3: '97', 4: 'What do you want to do most right now?', 5: '98'}
{3: 'I think family is about sharing everyday moments like that.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Right now... there's so much Bambinata wants to tell you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Inspired by your words, she seems to think of something. She picks up her figurine again and moves closer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Commandant, I placed a bet on the rabbit races by myself today, and I won the grand prize.', 4: '1'}
{2: "So that's what that noisy place was about?", 3: '106'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Yeah. There was one rabbit that always kept its head held high, so I bet on it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Yes. Bambinata even recorded it crossing the finish line.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Then, the day before yesterday, Bambinata helped choreograph the dances for the Double Seventh Festival performance... Ah...', 4: '1'}
{3: "She stops herself mid-sentence, realizing she might be revealing something she shouldn't, and quickly covers her mouth—just like that little rabbit she mentioned earlier."}
{2: "You've been working hard.", 3: '114', 4: '(Pat her head)', 5: '114'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Mhm. Bambinata told you on Valentine's Day that Bambinata wanted to do better, so Bambinata's been trying a lot of things. Oh, and before that...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Why don't we sit on the sofa to talk?", 3: '117'}
{3: "Now that she'd started opening up, she's clearly ready to share more about herself, and judging by her expression, it won't be a short story."}
{3: 'You guide the suited figurine to gently take the "family member" figurine\'s hand, leading her through the cozy doorway into the living room of the little house.'}
{3: 'Outside, the real world grows busier as footsteps and voices increase—probably the start of another event. But the two little residents inside the toy home remain unaffected.'}
{3: 'No matter how noisy it gets outside, they stay nestled together in their tiny world, sharing small moments and warm words.'}
{2: 'Before Bambinata finishes...', 3: '127'}
{2: 'This game of playing house will keep going.', 3: '128'}
